Desert.choice_desc: A vast and unforgiving land where ancient secrets lie beneath the sands.
Desert.enter_desc: You ventured into the endless expanse of the desert.
Desert.exit_desc: You left the scorching desert behind.

1.description: You spot a faint glimmer in the sand.

choices.description: Carefully dig with your shovel.

result.description: You unearthed a Golden Amulet, gleaming with ancient inscriptions.

choices.description: Use the pickaxe to break the crusty surface.

result.description: The surface was tougher than expected. You made no progress.

2.description: A sandstorm has partially uncovered an ancient stone tablet.

choices.description: Brush away the remaining sand.

result.description: The symbols on the stone tablet tell of a forgotten dynasty.

choices.description: Dig around the base with a shovel.

result.description: You cleared some sand but couldn't free the tablet.

3.description: You find an abandoned camp half-buried in the dunes.

choices.description: Carefully search with your brush.

result.description: Among the ruins, you discover a Jeweled Compass of unknown origin.

choices.description: Dig through the debris with your shovel.

result.description: The debris was too scattered to find anything useful.

4.description: An old well is visible in the distance, its structure still intact.

choices.description: Examine the well with your brush.

result.description: You found a Clay Water Vessel with intricate carvings.

choices.description: Break through some blocked stones with your pickaxe.

result.description: The stones were too firmly stuck to move.

5.description: A peculiar stone formation casts strange shadows at sunset.

choices.description: Brush away the dust and inspect closely.

result.description: Hidden within was a Desert Relic inscribed with mysterious runes.

choices.description: Attempt to pry the stones apart with your pickaxe.

result.description: The stones held firm despite your efforts.

Antarctica.choice_desc: A frozen wasteland filled with ancient mysteries buried under the ice.
Antarctica.enter_desc: You have arrived at the icy expanse of Antarctica.
Antarctica.exit_desc: You leave the harsh, frozen lands of Antarctica.

1.description: You discover a mysterious frozen chest buried in the ice.

choices.description: Use the pickaxe to break the ice carefully.

result.description: You skillfully break the ice and retrieve an ancient silver amulet.

choices.description: Use the shovel to dig around the chest.

result.description: The chest is too deep to dig out with a shovel.

2.description: You find ancient carvings on a rock face.

choices.description: Brush away the snow carefully.

result.description: You reveal intricate carvings depicting an unknown civilization.

choices.description: Use the pickaxe to chip off the rock for study.

result.description: The rock crumbles, destroying the carvings.

3.description: You encounter a frozen skeleton encased in ice.

choices.description: Use the pickaxe to free the skeleton.

result.description: You successfully extract the skeleton intact.

choices.description: Use the brush to gently clear the ice.

result.description: The ice is too thick; try another method.

4.description: You see a metallic object glinting under the ice.

choices.description: Dig with the shovel to uncover it.

result.description: You unearth a strange metallic relic.

choices.description: Use the pickaxe to smash through the ice.

result.description: The relic is damaged beyond recognition.

5.description: You come across an ice cave filled with shimmering crystals.

choices.description: Use the brush to collect small crystal samples.

result.description: You gather rare crystal specimens.

choices.description: Use the shovel to extract larger crystals.

result.description: The crystals shatter under the force of your digging.

Jungle Temple.choice_desc: An ancient temple hidden deep in the jungle, full of secrets and dangerous traps.
Jungle Temple.enter_desc: You ventured into the dense jungle and discovered a mysterious ancient temple.
Jungle Temple.exit_desc: You left the ancient temple, carrying memories and perhaps something more valuable.

16.description: You encounter a sealed stone door covered in ancient symbols.

choices.description: Carefully chip away at the door edges.

result.description: The door crumbles, revealing a hidden relic chamber.

choices.description: Try to dig under the door.

result.description: You only managed to create a shallow pit. No progress.

17.description: You find a pedestal holding a glowing crystal, surrounded by thorns.

choices.description: Carefully extract the crystal with the brush.

result.description: You safely retrieve the mysterious crystal.

choices.description: Try to cut through the thorns with the pickaxe.

result.description: The thorns were too tough and your pickaxe took serious damage.

18.description: A stone altar with carved figures stands before you, partially buried.

choices.description: Dig carefully around the altar.

result.description: You uncover an ancient ceremonial dagger!

choices.description: Attempt to pry the altar open with the pickaxe.

result.description: The altar didn’t budge, and your pickaxe chipped.

19.description: A collapsed passage with stone debris blocks your path.

choices.description: Clear the passage using the shovel.

result.description: You uncover an ancient engraved tablet!

choices.description: Attempt to climb over the debris.

result.description: You slipped and fell, sustaining minor injuries.

20.description: A small hidden chamber radiates a mystical aura.

choices.description: Explore the chamber with the brush.

result.description: You found a sacred idol imbued with ancient power!

choices.description: Try to pry loose floor stones with the pickaxe.

result.description: The stones didn’t budge, but your pickaxe is worse for wear.
